original_text: with four posts and four bronze bases. Their hooks and bands were silver, and their tops were overlaid with silver.
korean_text: 그 기둥은 넷인데 그 받침 넷은 놋이요 그 갈고리는 은이요 그 머리 싸개와 가름대도 은이며

sentences.original_text: with four posts and four bronze bases
sentences.korean_translation: 네 개의 기둥과 네 개의 청동 받침과 함께

sentences.original_text: Their hooks and bands were silver
and their tops were overlaid with silver
